name: Kate Wisconsin
description: Kate is a French-American amateur pastry chef and co-owner of bakery in New York City. She is best known for her croissant-donut.
opinion: 'Each time I throw a party Sweet Life is my go-to. I found on the website some of the loveliest dessert spreads I have ever seen. The recipes will go through every detail with you until it’s just right. Everything is beautiful and delicious.'

name: Emmanuel Borowski
description: Emmanuel is an American amateur pastry chef. In 2011, he was named one of the ten best amateur pastry chefs in America. He has also served as a judge in the 2013 US Pastry Competition and the Chicago Restaurant Pastry Competition, and as a guest amateur chef at the 2013 Friends of James Beard dinner, held by the James Beard Foundation.
opinion: 'Thank you sooooo much for the recipe for the most delicious muffins!!!! They not only tasted out of this world fabulous, they looked wonderful with the custom, hand made butterflies and dragonflies decorations!!! I'm so delightful to being a part of this community!!!'

name: Laura Knudsen
description: Laura is an Instagram Influencer based in Vancouver, Canada. She is mostly known for her artistic and coloured desserts. Laura first started to receive recognition for her desserts on social media in 2015. Today, known as the 'Glazing Queen', she teaches her worldwide Student Network through her extensive and technical Online Master Classes and Courses in Pastry Arts. In 2020, Laura released her third book 'Theory Guide: Great Glaze doesn't start with Glaze' representing her signature approach behind the shiny glaze and balanced entremets.
opinion: 'As soon as I brought out one of the cake to place on the table, my daughter ran right over. She was speechless and it really took her breath away. I will never forger her facial expression, I could barely even make out “Is this my cake?” My guests loved it as well, they even made a line to take pictures. The cake was just so adorable and too pretty to cut. I really appreciate the time and effort :) THANKS SO MUCH SWEET LIFE COMMUNITY! :)'

name: Hennry Bigtoe
description: Hennry is amateur Pastry Chef and partner of the dessert restaurant in New Orleans, Louisiana. Hennry enrolled himself in culinary school at Oakland Community College. His first job in the restaurant industry was working the sandwich board. While searching for jobs in hot food, Hennry dabbled in pastries on the side.
opinion: 'Where do I begin? Do I call or go anywhere else? Never! Sweet Life is my baking goddess. What would I do without all of you guys? Seriously, I have been so blessed by testing your cookies, cakes and muffins. Thank you for having me!'

name: Anita Krakowski
description: Anita is an Israeli journalist, bestselling cookbook author, and television personality. She began her culinary career as a recipe writer and editor at the food magazine, and after she has published her first dessert cookbook. In total she has published five cookbooks, including one for children.
opinion: 'I just had to tell you how much I LOVED cookies. I am a cookie lover, and those ones I can find in Sweet Life are the ABSOLUTE BEST I’ve ever had. I could make them every day. Really...THE BEST EXPERIENCES EVER!'
